name: Tech Lead / Senior Mobile Engineer (Flutter)
description:
* The vacancy involves relocation and work from Barcelona. The team is international, so a conversational level of English is required.

Our client, the European company which invests their time, money and talents in the fast-growing industry, supercharged by lockdown conditions in the global pandemic - FoodTech. They are developing the world’s first end-to-end ecosystem of virtual restaurants powered by autonomous robot-run kitchens to cope with current and potential challenges from the food market.

By now, they have several own working dark-kitchens which use software-defined and adaptive robots, computer vision, artificial intelligence and mechatronics that can ensure constant quality, adaptability to any recipe, and operational effectiveness across an endless variety of food production scenarios, they sell their food in multiple delivery platforms and are setting into production their own ordering app.

So to make the next step in this technological revolution, they need an experienced Senior Mobile Developer (Flutter).

THE ROLE

Your scope of work will include the development of the features for their autonomous kitchen internal solutions, as well as B2C customer-facing apps.

THE EXPECTED RESULT

Improving the internal application for working with big data, as well as developing client applications.

WHAT SUCCESS MEANS IN THIS ROLE:

  • You can work in close collaboration with the product team to create high-quality solutions,

  • You continually manage to meet product requirements,

  • Your code is clean, readable and well-structured,

  • Code performance is never an issue. You write efficient systems that scale,

  • You are flexible in what you work on every sprint.

YOUR QUALIFICATION:

  • A desire to work on something truly world-changing,

  • A proactive yet humble attitude,

  • Experience developing app-based products as an Android mobile developer,

  • M-commerce experience,

  • Familiarity with Flutter, Kotlin, GraphQL, Git, CI, AWS,

  • Experience working with Agile methodology,

  • You are pixel-perfect and care about the best possible user experience,

  • Fluent spoken and written English.

WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE THEM:

  • The chance to work on the next big thing in FoodTech,

  • Amazing colleagues and a great culture,

  • Personal growth, innovation and learning every day,

  • Relocation assistance,

  • The beaches, food, vibes, mountains and architecture of Barcelona,

  • Health insurance for you and your family,

  • 23-25 paid vacation days (+9 public holidays),

  • Return flights home,

  • Gym subscription.
